feed.title: SAP Community - SAP HANA
feed.subtitle: SAP HANA Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: HANA ODBC Connector with JWT
entry.content:
Hello experts,
is it possible to use the HANA ODBC Connector with JWT as an authentication method (assuming prior configuration of HANA)?
I have seen in the documentation that authenticationMethods can be assigned the value ‘JWT’. But shouldn't it then also be possible to specify the token? If so, which parameter is used to do this?

Best regards

Tristan

entry.title: Ust.-jahreserklärung für Deutschland (SAP S/4HANA - on-premise)
entry.content:
Hallo, 

für die Übermittlung der monatlichen Ust-Voranmeldung nutzen wir den Report RFUMSV00. Wir sind nun auf der Suche nach einer Standardtransaktion/-report um die Umsatzsteuerjahreserklärung für Deutschland zu erzeugen und ans Finanzamt zu senden. 

Kennt sich jemand mit dem Thema Steuern aus und kann uns hier weiterhelfen? 

Vielen Dank!

entry.title: Match-code button not appearing on Filter of extended field on a standard value help
entry.content:
We have extended the standard Value Help "C_MM_MaterialValueHelp" with the _Material.ProductHierarchy and it's description using an association to a custom Value Help (which is the Value Help of the Product Hierarchy in the filter options). 

When trying to access the field as a filter when using the Material Value Help, the field does not have the Match-Code button to allow access to our custom value help for the Product Hierarchy. 

Note that "@Consumption.valueHelpDefinition:" has been used to link the custom value help to the extended field. 

What have I tried till now: 

  1. Compared with existing filters
  2. Cleared cache, global and local

Did anyone come across a similar situation and how were you able to resolve the issue? 

Thanks.

entry.title: I want to verify how to separate backflushes asynchronously.
entry.content:
I want to verify how to separate backflushes asynchronously.
Separating receipt and issuance of components - As receipt is not done in real time, if semi-finished products are not received, an error may occur when backflushing finished products, resulting in a shortage of semi-finished products. For this reason, if backflushing is automatically processed in the background when receipt is triggered, no errors will occur. For example, received finished products -> executed by component background job (1) -> error -> received semi-finished products -> component background job (2) is executed, component background job (1) is also executed -> error resolved

entry.title: Is this just my system? cl_salv_table refresh method creates new alv (in R3 not)
entry.content:
Hi y'all,
Recently i noticed, that my programs that use cl_salv_table got broken with s4

I went and checked why, and noticed, when i call the refresh method in my coding A new alv screen is generated and the coding pauses, waiting for user interaction. 

this leads to my program breaking, as between the refresh method and alv display there is still things to do, 

when the user then presses back in the sap gui, only then the code after the refresh method loads.

 

here an example coding, that triggers this behaviour:

Is this just a bug with my system, or do your s4 systems do the same,

(my R3 system continues the coding and shows 'We have finished selecting...' before the alv display.)

to open spoiler remove the # in the url of this thread this is a sap bug lol

also the system i am on is s4 2023 on premise

Spoiler
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*

*& Report zzalv_bug

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*

*&

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*

REPORT zzalv_bug.

DATA go_alv TYPE REF TO cl_salv_table.

DATA GT_data TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF sflight.

SELECT * FROM sflight

INTO TABLE @GT_data[]

 UP TO 10 ROWS.

cl_salv_table=>factory(

* EXPORTING

* LIST_DISPLAY = IF_SALV_C_BOOL_SAP=>FALSE

* R_CONTAINER =

* CONTAINER_NAME =

 IMPORTING r_salv_table = go_alv

 CHANGING t_table = GT_data ).


" e.g. something changed

ASSIGN GT_data[ 1 ] TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<gs_messingaroung>).

<gs_messingaroung>-planetype = 'CHOCOLATE'.


" REFRESH WANTED NOT DISPLAY:

DATA ls_r_col_soft TYPE lvc_s_stbl.

ls_r_col_soft-col = 'X'.

ls_r_col_soft-row = 'X'.

go_alv->refresh( s_stable = ls_r_col_soft

refresh_mode = if_salv_c_refresh=>soft ).


MESSAGE 'We have finished selecting your data, here you go: (click ok)' TYPE 'I'.


" after we refreshed, we now want to display:

go_alv->display( ).

 

Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler
Spoiler

entry.title: No Account assignment category field in ME41
entry.content: There is no No Account assignment category field in ME41, but I see there is a field in other S4 system online. Is there any configuration missed?

entry.title: Error while creating behavior definition in ADT
entry.content:
Hello All,

When I am trying to create a behaviour definition for basic view in eclipse the system throws an error stating "type BDEF/BDO unknown" and when I tried to create directly via file->new->other->core data services->behaviour definition, I am getting error "No authorization to create objects of this object type in the selected project".

I have attach both the screenshot for you reference. 

Note: We have on Premise HANA system

entry.title: Questions about SAP licensing, hardware failure, and managing without a partner
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

My name is Marko , I’m from Lima, Peru. I currently work as a systems administrator and IT support specialist in a company running SAP Business One HANA 1.0 PL04 on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4.

We used to work with an SAP partner, but now we are managing the system fully in-house. Recently, our SAP HANA server’s motherboard failed, and we are facing some challenges. I would like to ask for advice from others who have experienced similar situations.

  1. I know SAP licenses are tied to the server hardware (e.g., MAC address). If the physical server fails, do we lose production access? Is it possible to temporarily run SAP on a virtual machine (VPS/Cloud) until the hardware is repaired?
  2. Is it feasible to set up a mirrored SAP server (replication or high availability) so that if one server fails, the other can continue running? Would we need to pay for a second license in that case?
  3. Since we no longer have an SAP partner, are we completely on our own? Is there a way to contact SAP directly for support and license management?
  4. Finally, if the company changes its legal name, how does that affect the licenses and ownership of the SAP system?

entry.title: Delivery date change in PO should not trigger workflow again
entry.content:
Hi community,

do sb know where in S4hana we can set that delivivery date change in PO is triggering PO workflow again?

We didn't find any config in SPRO, also not in SWDD_SCENARIO (WS00800238).

Thank you.

SAP HANA DB

SAP BW on HANA

Any advice or links would be very helpful.

Best regards
Venkat

entry.content:
HANA DB memory has been filled, is there any way to clear HANA memory without restarting the Database?

Are there any possible options?

entry.title: Production Plant for Customer JIT call in nJIT (Next-Generation JIT)
entry.content:
Hello,

We are using the nJIT S2C (Supply-to-Customer) scenario and receive the JitCallRequest via API calls.
Now, we would like to include the "Production Plant (external)" information in the API payload. We are not using SAP for the production plant. 

`AssemblyLocation` fields is using for customer's assembly location.

Could you please advise:

  • Which field in the JitCallRequest API is appropriate for this data?

  • If there is no standard field, what is the recommended way to include such external production plant information (e.g., through extension or custom field)?

Thanks in advance for your guidance.

entry.title: Adjust amounts in fixed asset depreciation areas
entry.content:
REQUEST: Adjust amounts in fixed asset depreciation areas
The client reports that they wish to massively adjust the acquisition and accumulated depreciation amounts in fixed asset depreciation areas 02 (USD currency) and 03 (EUR currency). The main depreciation area (area 01) is in VED currency, and the amounts are correct. Depreciation (AFAB) has already been executed for the current period: 12 (December), 2024.


Procedure 1:

Transaction ABZU allows you to adjust the accumulated depreciation as of December 31, 2024.

AW01N Areas 02 and 03

The AFAB is executed again in Re-execution mode. The AFAB run in TEST mode shows no problems:

However, when running in final mode, the RAPOST2000 program does not perform the accounting.

Procedure 2:

Because the RAPOST2000 program does not post in RERUN mode, a post-capitalization is attempted via transaction ABNAN. However, this transaction forces posting to area 01, which has the correct VED amounts. Direct post-capitalization is not permitted for depreciation areas 02 and 03.

The OABC is reviewed and it is found that the transfer values in areas 02 and 03 are derived from area 01.

The flag in the Ident. box is unchecked, but when trying to save, SAP displays message AC646.


PARV 04: It is not possible to transfer values from depreciation area 01.


Message number: AC646
Diagnosis
In the PARV chart of depreciation, the values for depreciation area 04 should be transferred from depreciation area 01. However, this is not possible because the value management for acquisition and production costs has been defined differently for areas 01 and 04.

The flag in the Ident. box is unchecked, but when trying to save, SAP displays message AC646.
PARV 04: It is not possible to transfer values from depreciation area 01.
Message number: AC646
Diagnosis
In the PARV chart of depreciation, the values for depreciation area 04 should be transferred from depreciation area 01. However, this is not possible because the value management for acquisition and production costs has been defined differently for areas 01 and 04.

entry.title: is the a transaction where I can get the value of mhdrz for products on a DESADV message without goi
entry.content: I need to find the life rule (MHDRZ) for a product when a delivery was created and messaged to the 3PL (the DESADV message). Is the a transaction that I can use without going through IDoc individual lines?

entry.title: Do we have to import lets encrypt root CA on HANA 2.0?
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

We are currently transitioning our TLS certificate root CA. Previously, we used DigiCert Global Root G2 to sign our TLS certificates. We are now in the process of switching our root CA to Let's Encrypt ISRG Root X1.

Our previous setup https://me.sap.com/notes/3400997  involves. We need to establish a secure connection using this new certificate chain.

I am wondering if we need to follow a similar process as described in the SAP Help Portal documentation for importing root CAs: https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_HANA_PLATFORM/6b94445c94ae495c83a19646e7c3fd56/86e96624e9a74e77994f7544db51061c.html?q=certificate+CA 

SAP HANA Enterprise Cloud

entry.title: How to Get Remaining Balance for Specific Line Item of an Invoice or Advance
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I’m trying to get a report in SAP that shows the remaining balance against a particular line item of an invoice or advance payment.

I have already tried the following:

  • J3RFPCR – This only shows the original payment document for Special G/L indicator ‘A’ (Down Payments) but not for other types of transactions.

  • S_ALR_87012105 – This doesn’t provide the line-item level remaining balance information I’m looking for.

👉 Internally, the system is working correctly – when I run F-53 (Post Outgoing Payment), SAP perfectly shows how much balance is left against that line item and how much I have already adjusted. But I need a report or transaction to view this information directly without going into F-53.

What I need is:

✅ A standard report or method to get the remaining open amount for each line item in an invoice/advance (not just at header level).
✅ Ability to see it for all Special G/L indicators, not just for ‘A’.

Is there any:

  • Standard report or transaction code?

  • Table combination or query that can achieve this?

  • Or do I need to go for a custom report? - I have tried table level but didn't get it, BSE_CLR, BSEG

Any suggestions or best practices would be highly appreciated.

Thank you!
